items.content_html: So at one point it was impossible to find a USB-C hub that was solely USB-C unless you wanted to pay a fortune for something like a OWC dock. Now they seem to be available from Belkin and Anker (maybe others). It’s about time.
items.content_text: So at one point it was impossible to find a USB-C hub that was solely USB-C unless you wanted to pay a fortune for something like a OWC dock. Now they seem to be available from Belkin and Anker (maybe others). It's about time.

items.content_html: Excited to see that Automattic has released a web clipper for Day One. Currently available for Firefox/Chrome. Hoping a Safari version is in the works. dayoneapp.com/releases/…

items.content_html: Love my kids more than anything but very happy my son is now back at college and our small house has one fewer adult in it. Our house is a tiny WW2-era Cape Cod and it not designed for 4 adults ðŸ˜†. Next stop January when my daughter moves out…
